metadata.title: French Colonial Sailors and Technological Knowledge in the Union Française
metadata.journal_or_publisher: The Institute of French Studies at New York University and the Minda de Gunzburg Center for European Studies at Harvard University

relevance.topic: Labor displacement due to technological change
relevance.relevance: The study examines the displacement of French colonial sailors due to the transition from steamships to diesel ships, highlighting the impact of technological change on labor.

design.sample_characteristics: French colonial sailors from West, Equatorial, and East Africa

independent_variables: Transition from steamships to diesel ships

dependent_variables.displaced: A large number of African sailors were laid off as their roles became obsolete.
dependent_variables.unemployment_or_underemployment: High levels of unemployment among African sailors in Marseille.

text_fragments: 'I have the honor to … draw your attention,' Hyacinthe Gomis wrote to the Bouches-du-Rhône prefect in 1954, 'to the misery and the difficult situation in which a large number of AOF and AEF men find themselves.'
'ONLY THE TRUTH MATTERS,' the organization wrote in all caps, they were being excluded 'BECAUSE THEY ARE BLACK.'
qualitative_data.narrative_descriptions: The study describes how African sailors were displaced due to technological changes in the shipping industry and how they contested the racialized assumptions about their skills and expertise.

technological_changes: Transition from steamships to diesel ships
historical_context.economic_conditions: Post-World War II modernization efforts in France.
historical_context.institutional_context: French colonial policies and the civilizing mission ideology.

outcomes.main_findings: African sailors were displaced due to the transition from steamships to diesel ships, and they contested the racialized assumptions about their skills.
outcomes.conclusions: The study concludes that technological change in the shipping industry led to labor displacement and highlighted racial and gendered notions of expertise.
outcomes.long_term_impacts: Many displaced sailors found work in other industries, contributing to the postwar economic development of France.
